description:
Time series forecasting has a wide range of applications: finance, retail, healthcare, etc. Deep Learning has proven to have state-of-the-art performance. NeuralForecast is a python library that we have developed to facilitate the use of these SOTA models. GitHub.com/nixtla/neuralforecast

Sigue a Federico Garza Ramírez:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/fede_gr
Sitio web: https://github.com/FedericoGarza

Sigue a PyLatam en:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PyLatam
Sitio oficial: https://pylatam.org/
title: State of the Art Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting
